primary.context: Customer wants to pay their maintenance fees via a link
primary.detail: The agent verified the caller and confirmed sending the payment link via text and email.

steps: Caller requested to pay maintenance fees.
Agent performed account lookup via caller ID.
Agent requested name verification; caller provided a different name (Cynthia vs Emil).
Agent confirmed contact information on file.
Agent confirmed sending the payment link via text and email.

clarifications.note: Initial name provided did not match record

actions.detail: Sent link to email and phone

insights.summary: The customer successfully requested and received a payment link for maintenance fees after a brief name verification step.
